```{css, echo = FALSE}
/*Inicio del cuerpo del programa*/
body {
  background-color: #C7C2AF;
  font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
  background-image: url("lineas2.png"), url("lineas.png"), url("circulos.png");
  background-repeat: no-repeat, no-repeat;
  background-position: top left, top right, top left;
}

/*Final del cuerpo del programa*/

/*Inicio de la barra de búsqueda*/
ul{
  list-style-type: none;
  margin-left: 6px;
  padding: 0;
  background-color: #C7C2AF;
  display: flex;
  box-shadow:
  -8px 0px #C7C2AF,
  -10px 0px rgb(65, 65, 65, 0.2),
  -15px 0px #C7C2AF,
  -24px 0px rgb(65, 65, 65, 0.2);
}

ul li a{
  background-color: rgb(48, 48, 40, 0.2);
  font-size: 15px;
  padding-right: 50px;
  margin: 0 8px;
  font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
  color: #414141;
}

ul li a:hover{
  background-color: #414141;
  font-size: 15px;
  font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
  color: #C7C2AF;
  box-shadow: 
  3px 2px 3px rgb(87, 87, 72, 0.5),  
  0 3px #C7C2AF,
  0 5px #414141,
  0 -3px #C7C2AF,
  0 -5px #414141;
}

/*Final de la barra de búsqueda*/

/*Inicio del texto utilizado*/

h1 {color: #414141}
h1 {text-shadow: 3px 4px #969696}

h4 {color: #414141}

/*Final del texto utilizado*/

/*inicio del apartado de links*/
a{
  background-color: rgb(48, 48, 40, 0.2);
  padding: 8px;
  padding-right: 50px;
  font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
  color: #414141
}

a:link{
  background-color: rgb(48, 48, 40, 0.2);
  font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
  color: #414141
}

a:hover{
  background-color: #414141;
  font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
  color: #C7C2AF;
  text-decoration:none;
  box-shadow: 
  2px 2px 3px rgb(87, 87, 72, 0.5),  
  0 3px #C7C2AF,
  0 5px #414141,
  0 -3px #C7C2AF,
  0 -5px #414141;
}

/*final del apartado de links*/

/*Inicio del apartado de íconos utilizados*/

.square{
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin-bottom: 4px;
}

.squarel{
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  display: none;
  margin-bottom: 4px;
}

li:hover .square:not(.squarel) {
  display: none;
}

li:hover .squarel {
  display: inline;
}

.arrow{
  width: 25px;
  height: 22px;
  margin-bottom: 4px;
  margin-left: 4px;
}

.arrowl{
  width: 25px;
  height: 22px;
  display: none;
  margin-bottom: 4px;
  margin-left: 4px;
}

p:hover .arrow:not(.arrowl) {
  display: none;
}

p:hover .arrowl {
  display: inline;
}

/*Inicio del apartado de íconos utilizados*/

/*Inicio del apartado de los títulos (panel oculto)*/

#introduccion{
  background-color: #D4D0BA;
  width: 400px;
  height: 300px;
  padding-top: 20px;
  box-shadow:
  3px 3px rgb(87, 87, 72, 0.5),  
  -20px 0px #C7C2AF,
  -22px 0px rgb(65, 65, 65, 0.2),
  -28px 0px #C7C2AF,
  -38px 0px rgb(65, 65, 65, 0.2);
  cursor: pointer;
  margin-left: 20px;
  margin-top: 35px;
  float: left;
  border: 10px;
}


#intro {
  margin-top: 30px;
  display: none;
  cursor: auto;
}

#encabezado {
  background-color: #D4D0BA;
  font-size: 18px;
  font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
  color: #414141;
}

#encabezado:hover {
  background-color: #414141;
  font-size: 18px;
  font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
  color: #C7C2AF;
  box-shadow:
  0 3px #C7C2AF,
  0 5px #414141,
  0 -3px #C7C2AF,
  0 -5px #414141;
}

#propo {
  background-color: #D4D0BA;
  width: 400px;
  height: 300px;
  padding-top: 20px;
  cursor: pointer;
  margin-left: 20px;
  margin-top: 35px;
  float: right;
  margin-top: 30px;
  display: none;
  cursor: auto;
}
```
```{js, echo = FALSE}
//función para mostrar el contenido de la introducción
function intro() {
  var x = document.getElementById("intro");
  if (x.style.display === "none") {
    x.style.display = "block";
  } else {
    x.style.display = "none";
  }
}

function propo() {
    var x = document.getElementById("propo");
    if (x.style.display === "none") {
        x.style.display = "block"; 
    } else {
        x.style.display = "none";
    }
}
```
